author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1379746 from branch-1 to branch-1.1 to fix HDFS-3871. Change DFSClient to use RetryUtils.

author: rvesse
msg: Adds support for parsing boolean results from TSV and CSV formats, updates QueryEngineHttp.execAsk() to use actual content type to choose parser and allow for TSV and CSV content type to be returned

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1368350 from branch-1 to branch-1.1 to fix HDFS-3667.  Add retry support to WebHdfsFileSystem.

author: larsh
msg: HBASE-6637 Move DaemonThreadFactory into Threads and Threads to hbase-common (Jesse Yates)
